content: this crochet pattern contains a very detailed description on how to create the doll with a great amount of images showing the step by step process the doll is without craft wire and fully safe the height of the toy is 9 4 inches materials yarn - yarn art jeans - 50g/160m 55% cotton 45% polyacrylic red color 90 green color 52 milky color 03 light green color 69 eyes on safety mount - 5 mm hook - 2 mm beads filler for toys holofiber sintepukh etc markers the digital pattern is available in eng/rus intermediate
